name: <core_simd::vector::Simd<*mut T, N> as core_simd::simd::cmp::ord::SimdPartialOrd>::simd_lt

core_simd::simd::ptr::mut_ptr::SimdMutPt.doc:
Gets the "address" portion of the pointer.

 This method discards pointer semantic metadata, so the result cannot be
 directly cast into a valid pointer.

 Equivalent to calling [`pointer::addr`] on each element.

core_simd::simd::cmp::ord::SimdPartialOr.doc: Test if each element is less than the corresponding element in `other`.
